text: @seanhannity During the briefing, Trump repeatedly insisted that he never saw top White House adviser’s Peter Navarro’s memos, which warned officials in late January the coronavirus crisis could put millions of Americans’ health at risk, and cost the country trillions. @piersmorgan @bbc5live
